Package pegasus.tensor

Interface Tensor

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
Vector<V>
All Known Implementing Classes:
LargeVector, Matrix, Quaternion, Vector10, Vector11, Vector12, Vector2, Vector3, Vector4, Vector5, Vector6, Vector7, Vector8, Vector9, Vertex2, Vertex3
public interface Tensor extends Serializable
A mathematical tensor.

  • Method Details

    • size

      int size()
      Returns the size of this tensor.
      Returns:
      The number of scalar components this tensor contains

    • isNaN

      boolean isNaN()
      Returns whether this tensor is not a number.
      Returns:
      true if this tensor contains at least one component whose value is not a number

    • isFinite

      boolean isFinite()
      Returns whether this tensor is finite.
      Returns:
      true if every component of this tensor is confirmed to be finite

    • isInfinite

      boolean isInfinite()
      Returns whether this tensor is infinite.
      Returns:
      true if this tensor contains at least one component whose value is infinite

    • stream

      DoubleStream stream()
      Returns a stream whose source is the scalar components of this tensor.
      Returns:
      A stream of this tensor

    • toArray

      double[] toArray()
      Returns an array containing the scalar components this tensor.
      Returns:
      The array representation of this tensor

      Checks for equality between this tensor and the provided object obj.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - The object to compare to
      Returns:
      true if the other object is also a tensor of the same type, and the dimensions and component values are equal
